oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: UNICEF tour - Tokyo, Japan - 1972 - part 9
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part nine of a 1972 UNICEF fundraiser tour performance in Tokyo, Japan. Featuring Tex Ritter (host/performer), Wanda Jackson (performer), Leroy Van Dyke (performer), and Bruce Reynolds (announcer).
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Wanda Jackson; Leroy Van Dyke
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) Wanda Jackson talks and introduces the next tune -- (00:29) Right Or Wrong (I'll Be With You) [Wanda Jackson] -- (02:08) Wanda Jackson talks about becoming a Christian and introduces the next tune -- (02:33) I Betcha My Heart I Love You (Wanda Jackson) -- (04:28) Jackson thanks the audience and introduces the next tune -- (04:57) Cowboy Yodel (Wanda Jackson) -- (06:51) Jackson thanks the audience -- (07:11) The King Is Coming (Wanda Jackson) -- (10:30) Ritter thanks Wanda Jackson and introduces Leroy Van Dyke -- (12:32) Big Wide Wonderful World Of Country Music (Leroy Van Dyke) -- (14:03) Van Dyke thanks and speaks to the audience in Japanese -- Van Dyke introduces the next tune -- (14:42) Your Cheatin' Heart (Leroy Van Dyke) -- (16:13) Jambalaya (Leroy Van Dyke) -- (17:48) Van Dyke talks and introduces the next tune -- (17:56) Black Cloud (Leroy Van Dyke) -- (22:00) Van Dyke thanks the audience and introduces the next tune -- (22:22) Walk On By (Leroy Van Dyke) -- (24:48) Van Dyke introduces the band -- (25:00) The Auctioneer (Leroy Van Dyke) -- (28:10) Ritter thanks Van Dyke and thanks the audience -- Ritter announces the remaining shows in Japan -- Closing statements (Tex Ritter) -- (31:08) Closing statements (Bruce Reynolds)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: UNICEF.; Jackson, Wanda, 1937-; Van Dyke, Leroy, 1929-; Ritter, Tex, 1905-1974;
